overview: "To such heights of evil are men driven by religion." – Lucretius.  Set during the militarism of the Gulf War, a capitalist and a diabolical priest entice a naïve young man into exploiting an innocent in this dark and biting satire of the American dream. Available Now on: Vimeo on Demand
tagline: After 4000 years of monumental chaos, if you've got hope you're up to no good.
title: Faith of Our Fathers
